hero.title: Clear tools and consulting for AI.
hero.subtitle: We design simple, accessible tools and offer pilot consulting starting in 2026. Products are in development.

highlights.title: What you get
highlights.item_1_body: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix are in development to help with travel and creative work.
highlights.item_2_body: Lesson plans and workshops that are easy to use and share.
highlights.item_3_body: Pilot sprints with clear documentation and opt-out controls.
highlights.item_4_body: Simple guides and events for families, students, and founders.

offer.title: What we offer
offer.consulting_body: We map use cases, run pilot sprints, and train your team.
offer.products_body: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix share the same accessible design system.
offer.education_body: Classroom kits and workshops. Simple to adapt and localize.

snapshots.title: Product snapshots
snapshots.intro: See work-in-progress screens from Ideonautix and NodeVoyage.
snapshots.ideo_body: A focused workspace for writing and pitching, with clear AI guidance.
snapshots.nv_body: Travel planning with collaborative timelines and transparent AI steps.

cta_block.title: Ready to start?
cta_block.body: Tell us your goals. We will help you choose the simple next step.

footer.note: Pre-incorporation. Ideju Kauss, October 2025. Based in Latvia. Remote-first.
footer.status: Pre-incorporation. Ideju Kauss, October 2025. Based in Latvia. Remote-first.
footer.partners_summary: We iterate alongside signage specialists so every AI prototype respects fabrication reality.

seo.default_description: AI innovation lab creating NodeVoyage travel platform and Ideonautix productivity suite. Pre-company phase, building Latvia's AI future from Daugavpils.
seo.default_og_description: AI innovation lab creating NodeVoyage travel platform and Ideonautix productivity suite. Pre-company phase, building Latvia's AI future from Daugavpils.
